issue.title: Transform from X2_1/base_link/imu_sensor to X2_1/base_link is unavailable

content.raw: I also tried using `X2_1/odom` and thought due to this change it now works, but in fact it then also worked with the `odom` frame. So something different has changed to make it work \(performance?\). And with `X2_1/odom` similar errors occur. And why is it working sometimes and sometime not?
content.html: I also tried using X2_1/odom and thought due to this change it now works, but in fact it then also worked with the odom frame. So something different has changed to make it work (performance?). And with X2_1/odom similar errors occur. And why is it working sometimes and sometime not?
